caption.p: Synthetic routes to compounds 5, 8, 10 and 12. Reagents and Conditions : (a) NaH, DME, 4-MeBnBr, RT-60 °C; 63%; (b) n-BuLi, DME, (R)-phenyloxirane, RT- 90 °C; 11%–20% (c) t-BuOK, THF, 0 °C–RT; 86%; (d) (CH 3) 3SOI, NaH, DMSO; 0 °C–RT; 54%; (e) LiOH, THF/MeOH/H 2O, 100 °C; 50–60%; (f) TES, Pd/C, MeOH, RT; 100%; (g) NH 2CH(CH 3) 2, RT; 55%;
